ygData.subject: Re: New Tinkerable item, scuba gear ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey my Tinkering friends, I had a Great time at Gnomefest  dueled a lvl 1 and lost my lvl it was great! Anyway I REALLY hate to burst anyones bubble too much
ygData.messageBody:
Hey my Tinkering friends,

I had a Great time at Gnomefest dueled a lvl 1 and lost my lvl it was great!

Anyway I REALLY hate to burst anyones bubble too much but there is a higher
lvl item that gives unlimited underwater breathing, yes the fish bone earing.
Until verrant makes us a commodity like rogues Make poison, enchanter's
Enchant " place your metal here" wizards " I can kill anything faster than
you AND translocate to a different plane". I realize that some of what I
said are not skills, they are class specific, but I believe you get the
point. We need something that only we can make and some people need,
everything we can make now can be bought, we need to petition for the fishing
pole to be either unbreakable or take away animated bait and make the
collapseable fishing pole always have bait, the duration for stalking probes
to last an entire zone, I am not even going to mention the fireworks, the
cams that when enchanted increase a stat like delay. I think we need to
organize ourselves and I think Rotgut needs to organize us 8) hee hee.
Remember anything we dont complain about becomes that wonderful " feature "
of the game. Again not to depress anyone.

Now taking your opinions. And yes all races and classes have a base 50 skill
in tinker only gnomes can increase the skill, and yes the fishing pole is
trivial at lvl 1 which makes me wonder why the third book is so elusive.

Abat cleric of the once 14 after gnomestock 13 then by the gods of Norrath
and a wonderful High lvl cleric Cantin I belive ..... 14 again. Solusek Ro
